# Xu Dog Questline

The Xu Dog is a friendly character and merchant you can meet in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. This character will teach you the art of crafting consumable medicine, and eventually allow you to invest in passive buffs.

## In the Sandgate Village
img_below_text: You can first encounter the **Xu Dog** just outside the Sandgate Village of Chapter 2’s Yellow Wind Ridge. Once you first enter the region, head along the main path across the pond and left along a ridge to reach the **Village Entrance Shrine**.
